title: Rajakumari Antique Kundan Haaram with Ruby Accents
materials: Natural Rubies. The gold used is of exceptional purity
adding to the heirloom quality of the piece.
features: Intricate Kundan setting showcases the uncut Polki diamonds to their fullest potential. The necklace features floral and paisley motifs, interspersed with vibrant rubies. Central pendant is a traditional half-moon (Ardha Chandra) design. The reverse of the necklace showcases delicate Meenakari work in traditional colors.
colors: Predominantly Gold with contrasting White (Kundan) and Ruby Red accents.
occasions: and other grand celebrations like seemantham or half-saree function (Langa Voni Function). Also a statement piece for high-end cultural events.
description: This haaram is a testament to Hyderabad's rich jewelry heritage. The antique Hyderabadi polish gives it a timeless appeal, while the combination of Kundan and Rubies makes it a truly regal piece. The meticulous craftsmanship ensures that this necklace will be a cherished heirloom for generations to come. Each diamond is carefully hand-set by master artisans.
